title: MY blue essence got taken away
body: I did the mission after i played my 1st match i went to claim the blue essence but instead of given to me it subtracted it also it said i got 2 chest and and i skin. I got the skin but cant find the chest to claim them anywhere

replies.body: The mission created capsules for you to open and redeem your essences.  Looking into this for you, it looks like they've been successful looted.  You can also check which skins you received through the purchase history of the store client.  Is everything okay now?
